item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: AppKit helps devs build best-in-class apps on your chain, with UX enhancements like:
Email and social login Fiat on-ramping In-app token swaps
Like WalletKit, AppKit is lightweight and easy to integrate for devs.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
AppKit helps devs build best-in-class apps on your chain, with UX enhancements like:

Email and social login
Fiat on-ramping
In-app token swaps

Like WalletKit, AppKit is lightweight and easy to integrate for devs.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: WalletKit provides an ultra-sleek wallet UX, with features like:
Instant connections to 1000s of apps across multiple chains One-click authentication Helpful notifications
On the dev side, WalletKit is easy to integrate with any app and supports all the most popular frameworks
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz

item.title:

‚úÖ No gas ‚úÖ No confirmations ‚úÖ No bridging

item.title:
RT by @conduitxyz: I‚Äôve joined @conduitxyz, leading our Ecosystem Partnerships! Conduit handles 60% of Ethereum‚Äôs onchain compute by offering the most performant and reliable infrastructure and is backed by top investors like @paradigm and @HaunVentures.
Conduit is powering 55+ mainnet (and 300+ testnet) networks while processing billions of monthly RPC calls. We work with standout customers like @ProofofPlay, @Blackbird_xyz, @Synthetix_io, and @Azuki.
Plus, we have 75+ ecosystem partners like @arbitrum, @Optimism, @celestia, @eigenlayer, @thirdweb, @circle, @dune, @privy_io, @RelayProtocol, and dozens more! (DM to chat about partnering with our ecosystem!)
My goal is to connect top-notch builders with technical partners while continuously and holistically strengthening our offering. Excited to advance Conduit‚Äôs mission to scale Ethereum!
item.dc:creator: @AndyDotETH
item.description:
I‚Äôve joined @conduitxyz, leading our Ecosystem Partnerships! Conduit handles 60% of Ethereum‚Äôs onchain compute by offering the most performant and reliable infrastructure and is backed by top investors like @paradigm and @HaunVentures.

Conduit is powering 55+ mainnet (and 300+ testnet) networks while processing billions of monthly RPC calls. We work with standout customers like @ProofofPlay, @Blackbird_xyz, @Synthetix_io, and @Azuki.

Plus, we have 75+ ecosystem partners like @arbitrum, @Optimism, @celestia, @eigenlayer, @thirdweb, @circle, @dune, @privy_io, @RelayProtocol, and dozens more! (DM to chat about partnering with our ecosystem!)

My goal is to connect top-notch builders with technical partners while continuously and holistically strengthening our offering. Excited to advance Conduit‚Äôs mission to scale Ethereum!

item.title:
RT by @conduitxyz: Wrapped and rewarded.
The #ETHDenver $FLY scavenger hunt was next level.
Big thanks to our partners @EthereumDenver, @DIMO_network, @conduitxyz, @SuccinctLabs, @Coinbase, @Privy, @Rally, @variantfund, @tributelabsxyz, @arbitrum, @syndicateio for making the magic happen.
See you next year?
item.dc:creator: @blackbird_xyz
item.description:
Wrapped and rewarded.

The #ETHDenver $FLY scavenger hunt was next level.

Big thanks to our partners @EthereumDenver, @DIMO_network, @conduitxyz, @SuccinctLabs, @Coinbase, @Privy, @Rally, @variantfund, @tributelabsxyz, @arbitrum, @syndicateio for making the magic happen.

See you next year?
